duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop training content for Cash Customer Onboarding and Management categories related to internal policy, regulatory requirements, and Cash App platform.
Create feedback mechanisms to ensure team members understand training content and can apply it to daily program execution.
Work closely with stakeholders to identify training opportunities, design/coordinate the development of training materials, and conduct training.
Maintain an understanding of Cash App products, features, and domestic and international compliance requirements.
Stay informed of regulatory developments, industry trends, and product roadmaps to ensure training programs are up-to-date.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
